name: Kilo CLI 1.0
description: An open-source, model-agnostic command-line interface for terminal-native AI coding with support for 500+ AI models, built on OpenCode foundation and backed by GitLab co-founder Sid Sijbrandij.
community_quotes: Kilo CLI 1.0 just launched - built on OpenCode as its open-source foundation

name: OpenAI Codex App
description: A native macOS desktop application that serves as an 'agent command center' for AI coding, allowing developers to run multiple AI agents with parallel workflows for software development.
community_quotes: OpenAI's new Codex Mac app is an agent command center
A command center for AI coding and software development
Positions OpenAI to compete with Claude Code and Cursor

name: Devlop Ai
description: An AI IDE specifically designed for embedded systems development that writes and flashes STM32 firmware for development boards.
community_quotes: An AI IDE that writes and flashes STM32 firmware

name: OpenClaw
description: A privacy-first personal AI assistant announced February 1, 2026 as part of Ollama's ecosystem, bridging messaging platforms to AI coding agents with an automated onboarding process.
community_quotes: Bridges messaging platforms to AI coding agents

name: Ollama Launch Command
description: A new command-line feature released on January 23, 2026 that enables zero-configuration setup for AI coding tools including Claude Code, OpenCode, Codex, and OpenClaw with local or cloud models.
community_quotes: Zero-configuration setup for AI coding tools
Enables running AI coding agents locally for better data privacy
